Name: One Soul
About the game: One Soul is a game of dungeon exploration in the vein of Dungeon Master, but with Souls-like mechanics, aimed at casual players. Key Features: Explore dark dungeons. Wield your sword to attack enemies (single, combo and strong attacks). Raise your shield to block light attacks, or dodge to avoid heavy attacks. Loot fallen enemies or find treasure chests to collect keys to open locks, food to restore your health or gold to increase your wealth. All art, music and other assets are custom made for this game, for a truly unique experience.
